snippet.title: Saint Seiya: Sanctuary Battle - UK Trailer
snippet.description:
The famous Japanese manga and anime series Saint Seiya get's an action oriented game from Namco Bandai in the new title "Saint Seiya: Sanctuary Battle." Watch as your favorite Knights of the Zodiac do battle across a PlayStation 3 battlefield. 

Release Date: TBA
Exclusively on: PlayStation 3
Genre: Action 
Publisher: Namco Bandai
Developer: Dimps

Lead your Knights of the Zodiac over to IGN for more info:
http://ps3.ign.com/objects/111/111753.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, guides, trailers and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
